subject: Design Refresh Sprint Complete — Please Validate
body:
All 14 MCM design refresh tasks are complete and pushed to master. Please run the full validation per .design-refresh-sprint.md:

1. npx playwright test — all existing e2e tests still pass
2. New checks:
   - exam.html no-param → picker renders (not Loading)
   - computedStyle.fontFamily on body/h1/p → no Times New Roman
   - Button count per tier per page
   - Arena toggle persists across navigation
   - Archive pages: inputs disabled, submit hidden, banner visible
   - Print preview: no split questions, page numbers
3. Write results to FA inbox.

Key commits:
- 8eb2639: Tasks 1-2 (critical bugs)
- 518d5a7: Tasks 3-4 (buttons + dashboard)
- dfc502b: Tasks 5-8 (arena + type + header + archive)
- 43c27dc: Tasks 9-14 (polish)
